name: CC TCP/IP Proxy Socket
desc:
I/O socket that serves as proxy TCP/IP server.

Accepts inter-plugin configuration values:
    { "tcp.host": "example.com"} - Override the remote host configuration
    { "tcp.port": 1234} - Override the remote port configuration.
    { "tcp.local_port": 1234} - Override the local port configuration.
    { "network.host": "example.com"} - Alias to "tcp.host".
    { "network.port": 1234} - Alias to "tcp.port".
    { "network.local_port": 1234} - Alias to "tcp.local_port".
